TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Authorization.AuthorizeRouteView
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
             Combines the behaviors of <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Authorization.AuthorizeView" /> and <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.RouteView" />,
             so that it displays the page matching the specified route but only if the user
             is authorized to see it.
            
             Additionally, this component supplies a cascading parameter of type <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />,
             which makes the user's current authentication state available to descendants.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: NotAuthorized
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The content that will be displayed if the user is not authorized.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Authorizing
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The content that will be displayed while asynchronous authorization is in progress.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Resource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The resource to which access is being controlled.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: RouteData
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the route data. This determines the page that will be
            displayed and the parameter values that will be supplied to the page.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DefaultLayout
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the type of a layout to be used if the page does not
            declare any layout. If specified, the type must implement <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.IComponent" />
            and accept a parameter named <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.LayoutComponentBase.Body" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Optionally gives a name to the provided value. Descendant components
             will be able to receive the value by specifying this name.
            
             If no name is specified, then descendant components will receive the
             value based the type of value they are requesting.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsFixed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If true, indicates that <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CascadingValue`1.Value" /> will not change. This is a
            performance optimization that allows the framework to skip setting up
            change notifications. Set this flag only if you will not change
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CascadingValue`1.Value" /> during the component's lifetime.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize<TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Provides functionality for rendering a virtualized list of items.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TItem">The <c>context</c> type for the items being rendered.</typeparam>

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize<TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the item template for the list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the item template for the list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template for items that have not yet been loaded in memory.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the size of each item in pixels. Defaults to 50px.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemsProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the function providing items to the list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Items
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the fixed item source.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OverscanCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that determines how many additional items will be rendered
            before and after the visible region. This help to reduce the frequency of rendering
            during scrolling. However, higher values mean that more elements will be present
            in the page.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SpacerElement
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets the tag name of the HTML element that will be used as the virtualization spacer.
             One such element will be rendered before the visible items, and one more after them, using
             an explicit "height" style to control the scroll range.
            
             The default value is "div". If you are placing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize`1" /> instance inside
             an element that requires a specific child tag name, consider setting that here. For example when
             rendering inside a "tbody", consider setting <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.Virtualization.Virtualize`1.SpacerElement" /> to the value "tr".
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

TagHelpers.Name: Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid<TGridItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            A component that displays a grid.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TGridItem">The type of data represented by each row in the grid.</typeparam>

BoundAttributes.Name: TGridItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TGridItem for the Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid<TGridItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Items
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             A queryable source of data for the grid.
            
             This could be in-memory data converted to queryable using the
             <see cref="M:System.Linq.Queryable.AsQueryable(System.Collections.IEnumerable)" /> extension method,
             or an EntityFramework DataSet or an <see cref="T:System.Linq.IQueryable" /> derived from it.
            
             You should supply either <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.Items" /> or <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.ItemsProvider" />, but not both.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemsProvider
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             A callback that supplies data for the rid.
            
             You should supply either <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.Items" /> or <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.ItemsProvider" />, but not both.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Class
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An optional CSS class name. If given, this will be included in the class attribute of the rendered table.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Theme
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A theme name, with default value "default". This affects which styling rules match the table.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the child components of this instance. For example, you may define columns by adding
            components derived from the <see cref="T:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridColumnBase`1" /> base class.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Virtualize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             If true, the grid will be rendered with virtualization. This is normally used in conjunction with
             scrolling and causes the grid to fetch and render only the data around the current scroll viewport.
             This can greatly improve the performance when scrolling through large data sets.
            
             If you use <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.Virtualize" />, you should supply a value for <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.ItemSize" /> and must
             ensure that every row renders with the same constant height.
            
             Generally it's preferable not to use <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.Virtualize" /> if the amount of data being rendered
             is small or if you are using pagination.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemSize
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            This is applicable only when using <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.Virtualize" />. It defines an expected height in pixels for
            each row, allowing the virtualization mechanism to fetch the correct number of items to match the display
            size and to ensure accurate scrolling.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ResizableColumns
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If true, renders draggable handles around the column headers, allowing the user to resize the columns
            manually. Size changes are not persisted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemKey
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Optionally defines a value for @key on each rendered row. Typically this should be used to specify a
             unique identifier, such as a primary key value, for each data item.
            
             This allows the grid to preserve the association between row elements and data items based on their
             unique identifiers, even when the <see cref="!:TGridItem" /> instances are replaced by new copies (for
             example, after a new query against the underlying data store).
            
             If not set, the @key will be the <see cref="!:TGridItem" /> instance itself.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Pagination
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Optionally links this <see cref="T:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1" /> instance with a <see cref="T:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridPaginationState" /> model,
             causing the grid to fetch and render only the current page of data.
            
             This is normally used in conjunction with a <see cref="!:Paginator" /> component or some other UI logic
             that displays and updates the supplied <see cref="T:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridPaginationState" /> instance.
             </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid<TGridItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:

TagHelpers.Name: Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridPropertyColumn<TGridItem, TProp>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Represents a <see cref="T:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1" /> column whose cells display a single value.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TGridItem">The type of data represented by each row in the grid.</typeparam>
            <typeparam name="TProp">The type of the value being displayed in the column's cells.</typeparam>

BoundAttributes.Name: TGridItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TGridItem for the Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridPropertyColumn<TGridItem, TProp> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TProp
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TProp for the Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridPropertyColumn<TGridItem, TProp> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: Property
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Defines the value to be displayed in this column's cells.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Format
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Optionally specifies a format string for the value.
            
             Using this requires the <typeparamref name="TProp" /> type to implement <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" />.
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Title
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Title text for the column. This is rendered automatically if <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridColumnBase`1.HeaderTemplate" /> is not used.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Class
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An optional CSS class name. If specified, this is included in the class attribute of table header and body cells
            for this column.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Align
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If specified, controls the justification of table header and body cells for this column.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An optional template for this column's header cell. If not specified, the default header template
            includes the <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridColumnBase`1.Title" /> along with any applicable sort indicators and options buttons.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ColumnOptions
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             If specified, indicates that this column has this associated options UI. A button to display this
             UI will be included in the header cell by default.
            
             If <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridColumnBase`1.HeaderTemplate" /> is used, it is left up to that template to render any relevant
             "show options" UI and invoke the grid's <see cref="M:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGrid`1.ShowColumnOptions(Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridColumnBase{`0})" />).
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Sortable
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Indicates whether the data should be sortable by this column.
            
             The default value may vary according to the column type (for example, a <see cref="T:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridTemplateColumn`1" />
             is sortable by default if any <see cref="P:Bit.BlazorUI.BitDataGridTemplateColumn`1.SortBy" /> parameter is specified).
             </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: IsDefaultSort
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If specified and not null, indicates that this column represents the initial sort order
            for the grid. The supplied value controls the default sort direction.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: PlaceholderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If specified, virtualized grids will use this template to render cells whose data has not yet been loaded.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.

BoundAttributes.Name: IsReadOnly
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A flag to mark rating control as readOnly
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowZeroStars
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Allow the initial rating value be 0. Note that a value of 0 still won't be selectable by mouse or keyboard
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AriaLabelFormat
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Optional label format for each individual rating star (not the rating control as a whole) that will be read by screen readers. 
            Placeholder {0} is the current rating and placeholder {1} is the max: for example, 
            "Select {0} of {1} stars". (To set the label for the control as a whole, use getAriaLabel or aria-label.)
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Max
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Maximum rating. Must be >= min (0 if AllowZeroStars is true, 1 otherwise)
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Icon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom icon name for selected rating elements, If unset, default will be the FavoriteStarFill icon
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: UnselectedIcon
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Custom icon name for unselected rating elements, If unset, default will be the FavoriteStar icon
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: DefaultValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Default value. Must be a number between min and max. 
            Only provide this if the CurrentValue is an uncontrolled component; otherwise, use the Value property.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Size
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Size of rating
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: GetAriaLabel
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Optional callback to set the aria-label for rating control in readOnly mode. Also used as a fallback aria-label if ariaLabel prop is not provided.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Callback that is called when the rating has changed
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputHtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes that will be applied to the created element.
            </summary>

<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.TagHelper" /> implementation targeting <cache> elements.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: priority
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory.CacheItemPriority" /> policy for the cache entry.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.String" /> to vary the cached result by.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by-header
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a comma-delimited set of HTTP request headers to vary the cached result by.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by-query
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a comma-delimited set of query parameters to vary the cached result by.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by-route
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a comma-delimited set of route data parameters to vary the cached result by.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by-cookie
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a comma-delimited set of cookie names to vary the cached result by.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by-user
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that determines if the cached result is to be varied by the Identity for the logged in
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext.User" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: vary-by-culture
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that determines if the cached result is to be varied by request culture.
            <para>
            Setting this to <c>true</c> would result in the result to be varied by <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture" />
            and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture" />.
            </para>
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: expires-on
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the exact <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> the cache entry should be evicted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: expires-after
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the duration, from the time the cache entry was added, when it should be evicted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: expires-sliding
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the duration from last access that the cache entry should be evicted.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the value which determines if the tag helper is enabled or not.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <environment> elements that conditionally renders
            content based on the current value of <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            If the environment is not listed in the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Names" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Include" />,
            or if it is in <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Exclude" />, the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: names
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of environment names in which the content should be rendered.
            If the current environment is also in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Exclude" /> list, the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The specified environment names are compared case insensitively to the current value of
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: include
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of environment names in which the content should be rendered.
            If the current environment is also in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.EnvironmentTagHelper.Exclude" /> list, the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The specified environment names are compared case insensitively to the current value of
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: exclude
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of environment names in which the content will not be rendered.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The specified environment names are compared case insensitively to the current value of
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment.EnvironmentName" />.
            </remarks>

            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: src
BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            Source of the image.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-append-version
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Value indicating if file version should be appended to the src urls.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            If <c>true</c> then a query string "v" with the encoded content of the file is added.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <input> elements with an <c>asp-for</c> attribute.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An expression to be evaluated against the current model.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-format
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The format string (see <see href="https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/txafckwd.aspx" />) used to format the
            <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.For" /> result. Sets the generated "value" attribute to that formatted string.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Not used if the provided (see <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.InputTypeName" />) or calculated "type" attribute value is
            <c>checkbox</c>, <c>password</c>, or <c>radio</c>. That is, <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.Format" /> is used when calling
            <see cref="M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.IHtmlGenerator.GenerateTextBox(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.ViewContext,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ModelExplorer,System.String,System.Object,System.String,System.Object)" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: type
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The type of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine the <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.IHtmlGenerator" />
            helper to call and the default <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.Format" /> value. A default <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.Format" /> is not calculated
            if the provided (see <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.InputTypeName" />) or calculated "type" attribute value is <c>checkbox</c>,
            <c>hidden</c>, <c>password</c>, or <c>radio</c>.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The name of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine whether <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.For" /> is
            valid with an empty <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ModelExpression.Name" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The value of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine the generated "checked" attribute
            if <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.InputTagHelper.InputTypeName" /> is "radio". Must not be <c>null</c> in that case.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LabelTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <label> elements with an <c>asp-for</c> attribute.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An expression to be evaluated against the current model.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <link> elements that supports fallback href paths.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The tag helper won't process for cases with just the 'href' attribute.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: href
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Address of the linked resource.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-href-include
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of CSS stylesheets to load.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-href-exclude
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of CSS stylesheets to exclude from loading.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.HrefInclude" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-href
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The URL of a CSS stylesheet to fallback to in the case the primary one fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-suppress-fallback-integrity
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Boolean value that determines if an integrity hash will be compared with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHref" /> value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-append-version
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Value indicating if file version should be appended to the href urls.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            If <c>true</c> then a query string "v" with the encoded content of the file is added.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-href-include
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of CSS stylesheets to fallback to in the case the primary
            one fails.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-href-exclude
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of CSS stylesheets to exclude from the fallback list, in
            the case the primary one fails.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHrefInclude" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-test-class
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The class name defined in the stylesheet to use for the fallback test.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackTestProperty" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackTestValue" />,
            and either <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHref" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHrefInclude" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-test-property
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The CSS property name to use for the fallback test.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackTestClass" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackTestValue" />,
            and either <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHref" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHrefInclude" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-test-value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The CSS property value to use for the fallback test.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackTestClass" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackTestProperty" />,
            and either <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHref" /> or <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.LinkTagHelper.FallbackHrefInclude" />.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.OptionTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <option> elements.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            This <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> works in conjunction with <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.SelectTagHelper" />. It reads elements
            content but does not modify that content. The only modification it makes is to add a <c>selected</c> attribute
            in some cases.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies a value for the <option> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.PartialTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Renders a partial view.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The name or path of the partial view that is rendered to the response.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An expression to be evaluated against the current model. Cannot be used together with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.PartialTagHelper.Model" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: model
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The model to pass into the partial view. Cannot be used together with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.PartialTagHelper.For" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: optional
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            When optional, executing the tag helper will no-op if the view cannot be located.
            Otherwise will throw stating the view could not be found.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: fallback-name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            View to lookup if the view specified by <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.PartialTagHelper.Name" /> cannot be located.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: view-data
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ViewDataDictionary" /> to pass into the partial view.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.PersistComponentStateTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            A <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.TagHelper" /> that saves the state of Razor components rendered on the page up to that point.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: persist-mode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.PersistComponentStateTagHelper.PersistenceMode" /> for the state to persist.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ScriptTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <script> elements that supports fallback src paths.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            The tag helper won't process for cases with just the 'src' attribute.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: src
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Address of the external script to use.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-src-include
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of JavaScript scripts to load.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-src-exclude
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of JavaScript scripts to exclude from loading.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ScriptTagHelper.SrcInclude" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-src
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The URL of a Script tag to fallback to in the case the primary one fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-suppress-fallback-integrity
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Boolean value that determines if an integrity hash will be compared with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ScriptTagHelper.FallbackSrc" /> value.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-append-version
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Value indicating if file version should be appended to src urls.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            A query string "v" with the encoded content of the file is added.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-src-include
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of JavaScript scripts to fallback to in the case the
            primary one fails.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-src-exclude
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A comma separated list of globbed file patterns of JavaScript scripts to exclude from the fallback list, in
            the case the primary one fails.
            The glob patterns are assessed relative to the application's 'webroot' setting.
            Must be used in conjunction with <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ScriptTagHelper.FallbackSrcInclude" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-fallback-test
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The script method defined in the primary script to use for the fallback test.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.SelectTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <select> elements with <c>asp-for</c> and/or
            <c>asp-items</c> attribute(s).
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An expression to be evaluated against the current model.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-items
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            A collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.SelectListItem" /> objects used to populate the <select> element with
            <optgroup> and <option> elements.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The name of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine whether <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.SelectTagHelper.For" /> is
            valid with an empty <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ModelExpression.Name" />.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.TextAreaTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting <textarea> elements with an <c>asp-for</c> attribute.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            An expression to be evaluated against the current model.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: name
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            The name of the <input> element.
            </summary>
            <remarks>
            Passed through to the generated HTML in all cases. Also used to determine whether <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.TextAreaTagHelper.For" /> is
            valid with an empty <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ViewFeatures.ModelExpression.Name" />.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ValidationMessageTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting any HTML element with an <c>asp-validation-for</c>
            attribute.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-validation-for
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets an expression to be evaluated against the current model.
            </summary>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ValidationSummaryTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting any HTML element with an <c>asp-validation-summary</c>
            attribute.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: asp-validation-summary
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            If <see cref="F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.ValidationSummary.All" /> or <see cref="F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.ValidationSummary.ModelOnly" />, appends a validation
            summary. Otherwise (<see cref="F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.ValidationSummary.None" />, the default), this tag helper does nothing.
            </summary>
            <exception cref="T:System.ArgumentException">
            Thrown if setter is called with an undefined <see cref="P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers.ValidationSummaryTagHelper.ValidationSummary" /> value e.g.
            <c>(ValidationSummary)23</c>.
            </exception>

TagHelpers.Name: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.TagHelpers.UrlResolutionTagHelper
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" /> implementation targeting elements containing attributes with URL expected values.
            </summary>
            <remarks>Resolves URLs starting with '~/' (relative to the application's 'webroot' setting) that are not
            targeted by other <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" />s. Runs prior to other <see cref="T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.TagHelpers.ITagHelper" />s to ensure
            application-relative URLs are resolved.</remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Bind
TagHelpers.Documentation: Binds the provided expression to an attribute and a change event, based on the naming of the bind attribute. For example: @bind-value="..." and @bind-value:event="onchange" will assign the current value of the expression to the 'value' attribute, and assign a delegate that attempts to set the value to the 'onchange' attribute.

BoundAttributes.Name: @bind-...
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Binds the provided expression to an attribute and a change event, based on the naming of the bind attribute. For example: @bind-value="..." and @bind-value:event="onchange" will assign the current value of the expression to the 'value' attribute, and assign a delegate that attempts to set the value to the 'onchange' attribute.

BoundAttributeParameters.Name: format
BoundAttributeParameters.Documentation: Specifies a format to convert the value specified by the corresponding bind attribute. For example: @bind-value:format="..." will apply a format string to the value specified in @bind-value="...". The format string can currently only be used with expressions of type DateTime.

BoundAttributeParameters.Name: event
BoundAttributeParameters.Documentation: Specifies the event handler name to attach for change notifications for the value provided by the '@bind-...' attribute.

BoundAttributeParameters.Name: culture
BoundAttributeParameters.Documentation: Specifies the culture to use for conversions.

BoundAttributeParameters.Name: get
BoundAttributeParameters.Documentation: Specifies the expression to use for binding the value to the attribute.

BoundAttributeParameters.Name: set
BoundAttributeParameters.Documentation: Specifies the expression to use for updating the bound value when a new value is available.

BoundAttributeParameters.Name: after
BoundAttributeParameters.Documentation: Specifies an action to run after the new value has been set.
